statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicsStudies;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM GenomicsStudies WHERE organism = 'Human';
SELECT researcher_name, study_name, organism FROM GenomicsStudies WHERE sequencing_technology = 'Illumina';
SELECT * FROM GenomicsStudies WHERE study_id = 3;
SELECT organism, COUNT(*) AS num_studies FROM GenomicsStudies GROUP BY organism ORDER BY num_studies DESC;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM GenomicsStudies WHERE organism = 'Human' ORDER BY study_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM GenomicsStudies WHERE sequencing_technology = 'NGS' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, study_name DESC;
SELECT study_name, COUNT(*) AS total_studies FROM GenomicsStudies GROUP BY study_name HAVING total_studies > 1 ORDER BY total_studies DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT organism FROM GenomicsStudies ORDER BY organism;
SELECT * FROM GenomicsStudies WHERE study_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY study_id;
SELECT * FROM genomics_study;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM proteomics_study WHERE sample_name = 'Sample A';
SELECT sample_name, genomic_data ->> 'gene_name' AS gene_name FROM genomics_study ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteomics_study WHERE sample_id = '8d66489d-a475-4797-bfe9-94132107f807';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_samples FROM genomics_study;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, genomic_data FROM genomics_study WHERE sample_name = 'Sample1'
SELECT * FROM genomics_study ORDER BY sample_name DESC
SELECT * FROM proteomics_study WHERE sample_id = '3d1b5ae6-ccc1-4ec7-8490-1d4a365e3b9f'
SELECT sample_id, proteomic_data FROM proteomics_study WHERE proteomic_data->>'protein_name' LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT * FROM genomics_study WHERE genomic_data->>'variant_type' = 'SNP'
SELECT * FROM genomics_data
SELECT sample_id, mutation_count, dna_sequence FROM genomics_data ORDER BY mutation_count DESC
SELECT protein_id, protein_sequence FROM proteomics_data WHERE sample_id = 3
SELECT * FROM metabolomics_data WHERE metabolite_concentration > 10.0
SELECT sample_id, metabolite_name FROM metabolomics_data
SELECT * FROM genomics_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT dna_sequence FROM genomics_data WHERE mutation_count > 5;
SELECT metabolite_id, metabolite_name, metabolite_concentration FROM metabolomics_data WHERE metabolite_concentration BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT protein_id, protein_sequence FROM proteomics_data WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT sample_id, dna_sequence, mutation_count FROM genomics_data LEFT JOIN proteomics_data ON genomics_data.sample_id = proteomics_data.sample_id;
SELECT * FROM Genomics ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_expression FROM Genomics WHERE gene_expression > 0.5;
SELECT metabolite_name, metabolite_concentration FROM Metabolomics WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT protein_id FROM Proteomics WHERE protein_abundance < 10.0 ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, researcher_name FROM ResearchData WHERE data_type = 'experiment';
SELECT gene_name, gene_expression FROM Genomics WHERE gene_expression > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_expression DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT protein_id, protein_abundance FROM Proteomics WHERE protein_abundance BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY protein_abundance ASC
SELECT metabolite_name, metabolite_concentration FROM Metabolomics WHERE metabolite_concentration < 100 ORDER BY metabolite_concentration DESC
SELECT data_id, researcher_name FROM ResearchData WHERE data_type = 'experiment' ORDER BY researcher_name
SELECT * FROM Genomics JOIN Proteomics USING (sample_id) WHERE gene_expression > 0.5 AND protein_abundance > 0.1
SELECT * FROM genomics_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, variant_type, genomic_position FROM genomics_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, data FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM proteomics_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data WHERE sample_id = 3 AND expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' AND variant_type = 'missense' ORDER BY genomic_position DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM proteomics_data WHERE sample_id = 12345 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT metabolite_name, concentration FROM metabolomics_data WHERE sample_id = 54321 AND concentration > 0.5 ORDER BY concentration ASC;
SELECT study_id, study_name FROM study_metadata WHERE researcher_id = 6789 ORDER BY study_id;
SELECT sample_id, study_type, study_description FROM sample_metadata WHERE study_type = 'Cancer' AND data_source = 'TCGA';
